subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The individual time trial, critical in determining the real contenders in the Giro d'Italia, will take place Thursday and gives American Levi Leipheimer his best chance to win.
snippet: The individual time trial, critical in determining the real contenders in the Giro d'Italia, will take place Thursday and gives American Levi Leipheimer his best chance to win.
